transform_def.name: allTile_Parabolic
transform_def.string: let pv = sin(pi()/P) pval = (1.0/sqrt(1.0 / (pv*pv) - 1.0)) * (1.0 / pv - 1.0) size = (1.0 / Size / pval) in allTile_Parabolic_init_result(allTile_Parabolic, 1/allTile_Parabolic, P, twopi() / P, pval, 2 * cos(pi()/P), 2 * cos(pi()/Q), size, 1.0 / size, Rotation * halfpi())

let rot = (floor(unit_rnd_1 * p) * tpop) pvi = complex(0, pval) pci = complex(0, ptc) ps = complex(0.0, 0.5) prrotation = complex(cos(rot0), sin(rot0)) porotation = complex(cos(-rot0), sin(-rot0))
z0 = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) * prescale prz0 = z0 * 1.5 - ps prz1 = ((prz0 + ps) / (-ps * prz0 + 1.0)) - i() prz2 = (prz1 - pval) / (-pval * prz1 + 1.0) prz = prz2 * invsize * prrotation z1 = (prz - 1.0) / (prz + 1.0) z2 = (z1 - pvi) / (-conj(pvi) * z1 + 1.0) za = 1.0 / (z2 + pci) zb = 1.0 / (-z2 + qtc) z3 = if(unit_rnd_0 > 0.5, za, zb) z4 = (z3 + pvi) / (conj(pvi) * z3 + 1.0) z = ((z4 + 1.0) / (-z4 + 1.0)) * complex(cos(rot), sin(rot)) poz0 = z * size * porotation poz1 = ((poz0 + pval) / (pval * poz0 + 1.0)) + i() poz2 = (poz1 - ps) / (ps * poz1 + 1.0) poz = (poz2 + ps) / 1.5 in toVec2(poz) * weight
